channel.title: Projects on Ben Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ben Smith

item.title: Demonstrating connections between structure and function through Bayesian modeling
item.description: I use Bayesian Joint Modeling to describe neural correlates of reward responsiveness, inhibition, and impulsivity and the interactions between them in a sample of 170 men who have sex with men.

item.title: A meta-analytical review of brain activity associated with intertemporal decisions: Evidence for a rostal-caudal tangibility axis
item.description: With evidence from a meta-analysis, I propose a rostral-caudal tangibility axis that helps to create general processes of psychological distance

item.title: Distinguishing honor, face, and dignity culture
item.description: with colleagues Peter Wang and Crystal Wang. We are examining the differences between Honor, Face, and Dignity culture. Leung & Cohen(2011) characterized these cultures in detail. We believe that systematic individual differences in personality can distinguish honor and face cultures, which, though distinct, have historically been difficult to characterize separately.
